author: Marcel

changelog.release_notes:
Implementation:
- Added setting to hide date
- Using Pebble Clay for configuration

Implementation
- Double vibe after receiving configuration update

Implementation: 
- Fixed missing leading zero in date
- Compiled for Pebble Classic (Aplite) running firmware 3.x

Design: 
- Added 5% battery level icon 

Implementation: 
- Fix for Dropbox HTTPS
- Animation delay before showing date made shorter

Design:
- All icons have been redesigned
- More classic signal indicator
- Thicker battery indicator with charging progress
- Charging and fully charged indicators
- Light theme adds border to date notification
- Preferences page
-- Date display time
-- Font thickness
-- Colour scheme
-- Leading zero

Implementation:
- Slight animation delay for date notification
- All programmatic memory leaks have been plugged

Design:
- Watchface colours according to Pebble model
- Date hides together with light fade
- Low battery also shown for very low levels
- Menu icon has transparent background

Implementation:
- Workaround for sub-10% battery levels

Design:
- Updated menu icon (BW and colour)
- Updated bluetooth icon (BW only now)

Design:
- Bold time font on Pebble Time

Design:
- Curved date notification on Pebble Time
- Rectangular date notification on Pebble Classic

Design:
- Nicer battery icon
- Adjusted date notification size

Design:
- Bigger signal and battery icons

Implementation:
- Code improvements

Design:
- Tap (wrist shake) to show date

Implementation:
- Code improvements

Design:
- Bluetooth signal icon
- Vibrations on signal connect / disconnect
- Battery level icon

Design:
- Colour flag for Pebble Time

Implementation:
- Universal app (SDK3) for Classic and Time
- Appstore descriptions for Aplite and Basalt

Design:
- Slight adjustments to time placement 

Implementation:
- Reverting to SDK2 (no SDK3 need for this watchface)

Design:
- Coat of arms replaced by flag
- Flag is black-and-white as well as coloured

Implementation:
- Universal (Aplite / Basalt)

description:
Jednoduchý ciferník s vlajkou Slovenskej Republiky a digitálnym dátumom a časom. "Ukáž sa!"

★ Verzia 2.0 s konfiguráciou je tu ★
★ Úplne vový design všetkých ikon ★
★ Zatras pre zobrazenie dátumu ★
❤︎ Nezabudni: páči = daj srdiečko! ❤︎

Ciferník je univerzálny - zobrazuje sa čiernobielo na originálnych Pebble hodinkách a farebne na Time hodinkách. 

Zdravím všetkých, ktorí si stiahli tento ciferník do Pebble aplikácie.

English
Simple watchface featuring Slovak Republic's flag and digital date/time. 

★ Version 2.0 with preferences ★
★ All icons completely re-designed ★
★ Tap (shake) to show date ★
❤︎ Give it a GO, give it a HEART! ❤︎

Watchface is universal - shows in black-and-white on Classic / Steel and in colour on Time / Steel. 

Greetings to all who downloaded this watchface!
